inst.name: Feeder1
inst.long-description: The Feeder service is used to feed data to any service to which its output port is linked. The service defines no input or output format for the messages. It can take any data as input and just sends it forward. The user can input data in the window which pops up on launching the service.
inst.configuration:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> 
<java version="1.5.0_12" class="java.beans.XMLDecoder"> 
 <object class="com.fiorano.bc.feeder.model.FeederPM"> 
  <void property="attachment"> 
   <object class="java.util.LinkedHashMap"/> 
  </void> 
  <void property="defaultMessage"> 
   <string><ns1:Root xmlns:ns1="http://www.fiorano.com/fesb/activity/XML2EDI1">
   <Empty>
      <segment>
         <ABC>ABC</ABC>
      </segment>
   </Empty>
</ns1:Root></string> 
  </void> 
  <void property="header"> 
   <object class="java.util.LinkedHashMap"/> 
  </void> 
 </object> 
</java>
